item.title: Little compile error
item.dc:creator: @armyman77777 armyman77777
item.description:
@armyman77777 wrote:

hi. when i compile i get this.

client.java:1157: 'else' without 'if; else if (command.startsWith("newcw")) ^ client.java:10512: '}" expected ^ 2 errors Starting FusionScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
and ill show you in client.java where it is. i added a little line before it though…probly why its messed up.

[code]//Torag

       if (command.startsWith("Torag"))
	{
		addItem(4745,1);
		addItem(4747,1);
		addItem(4749,1);
		addItem(4751,1);
             }

//Verac

       if (command.startsWith("Verac"))
	{
		addItem(4753,1);
		addItem(4755,1);
		addItem(4757,1);
		addItem(4759,1);
             }
if (playerRights >= 3) {    //all i did was add this.

else if (command.startsWith(“newcw”))
{
int length = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
cwTimer = length;
castleWarsOn = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “A Castle Wars match has begun!”;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“stopcw”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Castle Wars is Critically Stopped!”;[/code]
can anyone help?
